name: CRKT M16-10 Carson EDC Tanto Folding Knife, Black EDP Blade

reviews.name: CRKT M16-10KZ Every Day Carry Zytel Knife
reviews.reviewText: This knife is light, sharp, easy to handle, everything wanted in an EDC knife. The blade really does lock open very securely. It is such a perfect size I don't even know it's in my pocket most of the time. I got rid of a ZT301 as a comparison because of the size.
reviews.title: Great little knife!

reviews.name: CRKT M16-10KZ Every Day Carry Zytel Knife
reviews.reviewText: The Brand CRKT is well known for quality and then Walmart's price is a perfect match to a epic knife. It is sleek, lightweight and great design with safety features needed to push it to the needed quality limit. The product came in perfect casing and condition and was shipped relatively quick. completely happy with my purchase and definitely would buy again since online was quick and easy plus had all brands my store may have not.
reviews.title: This CRKT M16 is the quintessential Knife

reviews.name: CRKT M16-10KZ Every Day Carry Zytel Knife
reviews.reviewText: When first distributed through Walmart the knives were the bargain of the century. Now they are fairly priced - if you think $30 is too much to pay for a single blade knife, wait until you've broken 3 of the others.
reviews.title: best choice for a folding pocket knife
